This tests makes sure the touch event's radius property is scaled to account for browser zoom.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE

===Initial Zoom===
FAIL radiusX should be 4. Was 2.6666667461395264.
FAIL radiusY should be 10. Was 6.6666669845581055.
===Zoom 2X===
FAIL radiusX should be 2. Was 1.3333333730697632.
FAIL radiusY should be 5. Was 3.3333334922790527.
===Zoom 0.5X===
FAIL radiusX should be 8. Was 5.333333492279053.
FAIL radiusY should be 20. Was 13.333333969116211.
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
